body:
@mozilla/strategy-and-insights I'd like to get some feedback on the mockup in the comment above before we start working on it. It's depicts the changes to the recipe listing and recipe form to make common filters easier to enter. The filter expression box will still be available for more complex filters, and can be used in conjunction with simple filters.

What do ya'll think? Any questions?
